div.head: To the Authour, in praise of his Prospectiue Glasse.

lg.l: THy Verse containes pure language in true measure,
Thy View descries the Best blest Syon-hill,
Thy vow discouereth thy religious Will,
Thy Drift is to disclose to all this treasure:
Thy Verse, thy View, thy Vow, thy Drift declare
Thy Wit, thy Skill; thy Will, thy Zeale, all rare.

closer.signed: Thine in the truth of a friends affection, I.H. of Cambridge M. in Arts, and Preacher of Gods Word.
